android.car.app

接口 CarTaskViewHost


  • public interface CarTaskViewHost
    This is a blueprint to implement the host part of CarTaskViewClient.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Adds the given insets on the Task.
      void createLaunchRootTask(int displayId, boolean embedHomeTask, boolean embedRecentsTask, boolean embedAssistantTask)
      Creates the launch root task, which will be embedded inside this task view.
      void createRootTask(int displayId)
      Creates the root task, which will be embedded inside this task view.
      void notifySurfaceCreated(SurfaceControl control)
      Notifies the host side that the client surface has been created.
      void notifySurfaceDestroyed()
      Notifies the host side that the client surface has been destroyed.
      void release()
      Releases the resources held by this task view's host side.
      void removeInsets(int index, int type)
      Removes the insets for the given @code index}, and type that were added via addInsets(int, int, Rect)
      void setWindowBounds(Rect windowBoundsOnScreen)
      Sets the bounds of the window for the underlying Task.
      void showEmbeddedTask()

      See TaskView#startActivity(PendingIntent, Intent, ActivityOptions, Rect)

        Notifies the host side that the client surface has been created.

        Sets the bounds of the window for the underlying Task.
        参数:

        Notifies the host side that the client surface has been destroyed.

      • showEmbeddedTask

        void showEmbeddedTask()
        Brings the embedded Task to the front in the WM Hierarchy.

      • addInsets

        void addInsets(int index,
               int type,
               Rect frame)
        Adds the given insets on the Task.

        The given rectangle for the given insets type is applied to the underlying task right away. If a rectangle for an insets type was added previously, it will be replaced with the new value. If a rectangle for an insets type was already added, but is not specified currently in insets, it will remain applied to the task. Clients should explicitly call removeInsets(int, int) to remove the rectangle for that insets type from the underlying task.

        参数:
        index - An owner might add multiple insets sources with the same type. This identifies them.
        type - The insets type of the insets source. This doesn't accept the composite types.
        frame - The rectangle area of the insets source.

      • removeInsets

        void removeInsets(int index,
                  int type)
        Removes the insets for the given @code index}, and type that were added via addInsets(int, int, Rect)
